No

Description

A concrete class for working with YouTube user activity entries.

Methods

__construct, getActivityType, getAuthorName, getDOM, getRating, getRatingValue, getUsername, getVideoId, takeChildFromDOM,

__construct( DOMElement   $element = null, ) : n/a

Description

Constructs a new Zend_Gdata_YouTube_ActivityEntry object.

Arguments

Name Type Description Default
$element DOMElement | (optional) The DOMElement on which to base this object. null

Return value

Type Description
n/a n/a

getActivityType( ) : string|null

Description

Return the activity type that was performed.

Convenience method that inspects category where scheme is http://gdata.youtube.com/schemas/2007/userevents.cat.


Return value

Type Description
string|null The activity category if found.

getAuthorName( ) : string

Description

Convenience method to quickly get access to the author of the activity

Return value

Type Description
string The author of the activity

getDOM( DOMDocument   $doc = null,   $majorVersion = 1,   $minorVersion = null, ) : DOMElement

Description

Retrieves a DOMElement which corresponds to this element and all child properties. This is used to build an entry back into a DOM and eventually XML text for application storage/persistence.

Arguments

Name Type Description Default
$doc DOMDocument | The DOMDocument used to construct DOMElements null
$majorVersion n/a 1
$minorVersion n/a null

Return value

Type Description
DOMElement The DOMElement representing this element and all child properties.

getRating( ) : null|Zend_Gdata_YouTube_Extension_Rating

Description

Returns the rating for this activity entry.

Return value

Type Description
null|Zend_Gdata_YouTube_Extension_Rating

getRatingValue( ) : integer|null

Description

Return the value of the rating for this video entry.

Convenience method to save needless typing.


Return value

Type Description
integer|null The value of the rating that was created, if found.

getUsername( ) : null|Zend_Gdata_YouTube_Extension_Username

Description

Returns the username for this activity entry.

Return value

Type Description
null|Zend_Gdata_YouTube_Extension_Username

getVideoId( ) : null|Zend_Gdata_YouTube_Extension_VideoId

Description

Returns the video ID for this activity entry.

Return value

Type Description
null|Zend_Gdata_YouTube_Extension_VideoId

takeChildFromDOM( DOMNode   $child, ) : n/a

Description

Creates individual Entry objects of the appropriate type and stores them as members of this entry based upon DOM data.

Arguments

Name Type Description Default
$child DOMNode | The DOMNode to process

Return value

Type Description
n/a n/a
